msbt.message: Oh, . There's this thing I've been consideringand I wonder if you might be able to help. I wonder, have you ever considered exploring other frontiers? I mean have you considered moving away?I can't help but feel there's so much more to see and do. And darling, I mustn't stifle my personal growth!SoI've been thinking about moving to another island. Now be honest, what do you think?

, ! You're just in time to be the first to hear my exciting news. Ideally you'd be sitting down for this, butI've decided that I'm going to be moving away! Now, don't be distraught. I don't dislike you or any of my wonderfully down-to-earth neighbors. But I believe it's time I moved on. One can't keep up with the latest trends by staying in one spot!

Pardon me for not noticing you, . I've got a lot on my mind right now.Out of curiositywhat would your reaction be if I was to tell you that I'm planning to move away?Shock? Nausea? A dead faint? Nothing too dramatic, I hopefor that's exactly what I'm pondering.Has the time come for me to make a change? Or should I settle for staying here? What do you think?
Oh! Youwish I wouldn't move?Hm. I shouldn't be surprised. How will the people of ever get along without me?Say no more! I'll stay right where I am, among those who know how to appreciate me most!

Oh You'd rather I stay put, hm?How foolish of me! I mustn't neglect all my admirers here! The world is cruel, but is kind. ! No more talk of moving! I shall remain here and accept the love showered upon me.
! I'd be a beast to leave after such a heartfelt plea!Pardon me. I must alert the realtors, box supplier, and moving company that the move is CANCELED!

Thank you for all of your support during my time here. I leave with a heavy heart, trust me.But I cannot stagnate in the same pool forever! I'm ready to leave the water! I'm readyto fly!Best of luck to us both in all our future endeavors, !
I knew you'd see my perspective.I shall treasure my memories of this island forever, and especially my memories of you, . I do hope you never forget me, .
It's not that I NEEDED your approval or permissionbut it's nice to have them nonetheless, .Though I shall be gone, I trust my memory will loom large in the minds of .
